I am a first-year Master's student in Business Analytics at the Faculty of Economics, [Monash University](https://www.monash.edu/business/ebs), under the supervision of Professor [Dianne Cook](http://www.dicook.org/) and Dr. [Michael Lydeamore](https://research.monash.edu/en/persons/michael-lydeamore). With 5 years of experience as a Data Engineer in the telecommunication sector, I have developed strong expertise in Data Engineering, Database Development, ETL processes, and Business Intelligence. I am passionate about leveraging data to support strategic decision-making and continuously seek to expand my knowledge in analytics and emerging technologies.
